akn:content.akn:p: Subject to the requirements in subsections (a-1) and (a-2) of this section, the Mayor is authorized to make grants to a single non-service provider, nonprofit organization of which at least 90% shall be used to make sub-grants for the purpose of providing services to District children, youth and their families, including, but not limited to, early childhood development opportunities, safe and enriching centers of learning in and out of school, and other training, recreational and educational services.

No grant may be awarded under this section in excess of $1 million during a 12-month period, either singularly or cumulatively, unless the grant is submitted to the Council for approval, in accordance with ยง 1-204.51, or by act.
